long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly organize tabs:
- Group or close tabs based on the filter
- Sort and close tabs by domain
- Remove duplicates
- Unload tabs to free memory
- Import and export them to Text, Markdown, CSV and JSON
